verses.translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest

verses.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.transliteration: Wa ra'ayta an-nasa yadkhuluna fi dini Allahi afwajan
verses.translation: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirhu innahu kana tawwaban
verses.translation: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance
